channel.title: Touchpad scroll broken etc.
channel.description:
I've had to get my laptop reformatted recently and now the scroll bar on the touch pad isn't working and it's starting to bother me. I've been looking for different drivers to try to fix the issue, but I haven't been able to find anything that works.
I've got an acer aspire 7741Z
Any help would be appreciated.
Bonus: There used to be an on screen indicator whenever I toggled caps lock num lock or scroll lock, but that's gone too.

item.title: Touchpad scroll broken etc.
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Dr. Strangelove:

I’ve already googled, and I’ve found nothing that has helped me.

Same goes for that link.

That’s funny, I found the drivers you need just fine on that link.
acade365’s links work just fine as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Touchpad scroll broken etc.
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
You’re missing the drivers for the touchpad.
A simple google search for “acer aspire 7741Z drivers” brought up this, and many other links.

https://www.laptop-software.com/acer-software/acer-aspire-77417741g7741z7741zg-windows-7-drivers/

Google before you ask questions. Good luck.

Read full topic
